data.text: The service is very helpful and the breakfast is delicious with a wide range of varieties of food. This hotel does not disappoint at all! There is a swimming pool at floor 4; the water is warm and it feels like paradise. There is even a sauna in the changing rooms! This hotel has everything you can think of.
data.title: Amazing Experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear homsterh, Thank you so much for taking the time to review us . We are delighted to know that you enjoyed the experience in the hotel. We will also convey your constructive feedback to the management, and we hope you will give us a chance to serve you again.
 Warm Regards
 Salaheldin Mohamed
 Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Salaheldin Mohamed

data.text: I am from the Philippines and jist visisted my brothers in Dubai. So this is my 1st time to dine in this restaurant. The food is ok since what they have is Asian cuisine. I would like to commend the staff since they are friendly especially Nina who assisted us throughout the brunch. They are all friendly and very helpful. Recommending the Spice Island Buffet in Dubai.
data.title: Taste Asian cuisine

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Khayeanz,

Thank you for the excellent rating & feedback about your most recent visit to Crowne Plaza Dubai Deira. We are so glad to see that you enjoyed your stay with us. 
We look forward to welcoming you back to the hotel shortly, where we can have the opportunity to showcase our True Hospitality once again. 

Warm regards, 

Malak Mohran
Duty Manager
owner_response.author: Salaheldin Mohamed

data.text: Nice ambience, good food and many selections, amazing staff and customer service. We have dined here many times and always, we find the food in great quality and taste. The location is also nice as you can use your private car or take the metro or taxi to reach the hotel where this restaurant is. Staff are very courteous and attentive. Special thanks to Nina for giving us a warm service and attending to our requests.
data.title: Great food, amazing place and nice staff

data.text: Good selection of asian food. Enjoyed the halo halo do it your own way. Staffs are very attentive and courteous. Nina was the one who greeted as when we sat at the table and was already asking us of what we want to drink. They even brought the coffee to our table.
data.title: Asian Brunch

data.text: Wonderful team as well going with nice services by Front Office . We can see a lot of supporting from front desk whatever we need . They are always welcoming and smiling from front desk whoever stand there . They are asking always our experience staying here . We can see us their caring. Special thanks Miss Phoo . You are the one having greet services .
data.title: Appreciate Miss Phoo
